title: citrAmbari shivarAja
sahitya:
citrAmbari shivaAja gauri dhyAnAlayattin jnAna saundari tAyE


anupallavi

  shuddhAdvaita siddhi aruLvAi sUriyanaip-pOlE pAril vAzhavE


caraNam    dAha mOha shOka vEgaminriyE tAnAna caitanyattil onriyE
mEgha rAsikkellAm mElOngi nirkkum AghAya sAkSiyAga shAntam aruL
